h3_title: Secret - Defeat the Stone Vanguard with the Shigandang
content: Defeating the Shigandang will earn you a Mind Core, 2 Yaoguai Core, 1371 Will, and a Heart of Stone material, allowing you to craft a new weapon, the Cloud-Patterned Stone Staff! You’ll also gain the Skandha of Feeling, which is the second mysterious Skandha Key Item you can find in the game after the Skandha of Form early in Chapter 1.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Shigandang.md', within the main section titled 'Shigandang', specifically from the subsection 'Shigandang Boss Fight and Guide' and the sub-subsection 'Secret - Defeat the Stone Vanguard with the Shigandang'.
The content is as follows:
Defeating the Shigandang will earn you a Mind Core, 2 Yaoguai Core, 1371 Will, and a Heart of Stone material, allowing you to craft a new weapon, the Cloud-Patterned Stone Staff! You’ll also gain the Skandha of Feeling, which is the second mysterious Skandha Key Item you can find in the game after the Skandha of Form early in Chapter 1.
